projects.title: SFSU Project: Photo Web-App
projects.description: Fullstack web project, for class SFSU. The project is a photo web app where an user can register and publish post on his feed where other people can see it and coment it. I build the front and back. The front was in pure react and the back in nest js mongodb. Everything was in a container

projects.title: Clothe First IOS app
